# Tender Announcement: Aircraft Platform Scales
**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for Aircraft Platform Scales
**Reference Number:** WS4066819775-Doc4147723532
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** WS4066819775
**Publication Date:** August 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023, 14:00 EST

## Tender Overview
Transport Canada has a requirement to purchase one (1) set of three (3) Aircraft Weighing Platform Scales and ancillary items as per the Statement of Work (Annex A, dated July 13, 2023) and Pricing (Annex B). The requirement includes an option to purchase up to two (2) sets of three (3) Aircraft Weighing Platform Scales and ancillary items within twelve (12) months from the contract effective date.

## Tender Description
The proposed solution must meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work and Pricing annexes. The chosen bidder must demonstrate their ability to deliver the required goods within the specified timeframe and adhere to the terms and conditions outlined in the tender document.

## Tender Status
**Tender Status:** Expired (Please note that the closing time has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 19, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.)

## Tender Information
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**

    * **Name:** Raphael Lafontaine (SPAC/PSPC)
    * **Email:** raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    * **Phone:** Not provided
## Documents

*(None attached)*
